page.title: 11Burley School Employment.
page.content: Most people's parents work in Burley village. Altogether eleven of them are mothers and four are fathers.Twelve people's parents work in different places they are all fathers. Six people's parents work in Ringwood two of them are mothers and the rest are fathers.Three people's parents work in Poole one is a mother and the rest are fathers .Two people's parents work abroad,both fathers,and one person's father works in Eastleigh.There are three teachers that work in Burley school.One secretary,one part time teacher comes in every Friday or other days if teachers are absent.Two dinner ladies and two supervisors who do playground duty as well.One teacher comes in every Tuesday who teaches music and singing. By Emma Wilson and Kelly Edwards.
